about_the_game:
Where the rains are incessant and there is no end to bamboo, our hero lives. He likes peace and tranquility, so he prefers to climb the highest bamboo! Only there he can plunge into the abyss of his thoughts. The power is in knowledge, which means that in order to win, you need to know everything about your opponent before you act! Panda sage will calculate every move of the opponent, but remember to use his power you need peace and quiet!
Have you ever seen a panda without bamboo in its bite? Therefore, the legendary bamboo cubes come as a gift! Treat your character to first-class bamboo leaves!

After purchasing this content, you will receive in your collection the character "Panda Sage", "Panda Cubes with bamboo", as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips.
